oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #099
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #99, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins, Skeeter Willis and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Willis Brothers; Tennessee Plowboys; Oklahoma Wranglers; Skeeter Willis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- I Want To Be Sure (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Bouquet Of Roses (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton talks -- Hal Horton introduces the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Shame On You (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Rubber Dolly (Skeeter Willis fiddle) -- Hal Horton talks -- Will The Circle Be Unbroken (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group); Wiggins, Roy; Willis, Skeeter, -1976;
